subject: For your kind attention
body:
For your kind attention
I am a Systems Engineer on foreign assignment to Gatwick London England by the request of British authorities . I am presently attached to Gatwick International Airport here in London. My primary assignment includes to install security equipment and improve on security Networks at all Britain Airports. I am also presently assigned with the duties of inspecting all diplomatic consignments and related luggage belonging to Government of Nations which are arriving the shores of Britain with sophiscated equipments.
My Intelligence Security Network Apparatus has foiled attempt by some Syndicates who work with some Banks within Europe, America, Asia and Middle East inconjection with some corrupt officials to divert a huge  amount of fund in cash valued Millions of USD in bank save containers using Diplomatic Courier Services Company. My personal preliminary investigations certified that you are the original owner of the fund/consignee as documented from the source of origin. Please confirm to me immediately if you have any Missing/Underlivered consignment or uncompleted funds transfer due to unusual request of outrageous charges from corrupt officials. I need your urgent response to this notification to enable me take the next line of actions in this matter. But be assured that if you have any uncompleted fund transfer or undelivered luggage/consignment, it is very save and secured in our facility and would be unconditionally released to you after matters have been cleared and regularized.
Yours sincerely,
Thompson Peter
Email :thompsonpeter1717@gmail.com

subject: Re:   For your kind attention
body:
Hello Thompson Peter,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information. It sounds like you have a very important job at Gatwick Airport in London, ensuring the security of all Britain Airports. That's quite impressive!

I'm curious about these syndicates you mentioned. How do they operate? And how does your Security Network Apparatus help foil their attempts?

As for any missing funds or transfers, I can't recall any such instances. However, I appreciate your assurance that if there were any, they would be safe and secure.

Looking forward to hearing more from you.

Best wishes,
Ryan

subject: Re: For your kind attention
body:

your prompt response, and the confirmation of your full details.
Once received, I will call you for further details.
The record before shows that you are the owner of the consignment which is
worth millions of dollars.

I await your response.
Regards,

Thompson Peter

Within 7 working days it will be resolved and delivered. There is a process
we call the diplomatic delivery system .There is a process to obtain a
global clearance certificate. All these can be achieved within 7
working days.

There is coverage that the authorities in your country will not be able to
question the consignment at the airport due to the diplomatic bag that will
be used. That is what is referred to as DIPLOMATIC COVERAGE CERTIFICATE.

body:

subject: Re: For your kind attention
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. I appreciate your promptness. However, before we proceed, could you please provide me with more information about the transaction? What is it for exactly? And how did you get my contact information?

Remember, I'm not able to share any personal or account details at this time. But I'm happy to discuss further details about the transaction.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Ryan

subject: Re: For your kind attention
body: This message has been sent over and over and I gave you all the details.

subject: Re: For your kind attention
body:

subject: Re: For your kind attention
body:
It is obvious that I am talking to someone who lacks understanding of what
is happening after so much explanation. We can't continue to be in a circle
every time. I have told you the amount to pay, and what is meant for.
Each time you want issues that have been discussed and dusted to be
repeated over and over again. This is not how to make progress regarding
such things.

If you are ready and serious about this, ask for an account to make
the payment between now and tomorrow.
Regards,

Thompson Peter

subject: Re: For your kind attention
body:
Hello Thompson Peter,

Thank you for your message. I appreciate your patience with me, as I sometimes need things explained more than once to fully understand them. 

Could you please clarify what the payment is for? And how will it benefit me? I'm just trying to make sure I have all the details straight.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Ryan

subject: Re: For your kind attention
body:
I have given you the purpose, and of the figures of the payment. I don't
know how else to explain it further.What is in for you is 75% of the
amount which you will be in charge of.

subject: Re: For your kind attention
body:

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Ryan

subject: Re: For your kind attention

subject: Re: For your kind attention
body:
You are going to be in charge of the amount that will be delivered to your
house through a diplomatic bag .I have explained this over and over to you
.Make haste and let's not allow this to exceed this week .

subject: Re: For your kind attention
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. I'm really excited about this opportunity! Could you please explain a bit more about the process? How does the delivery through diplomatic bag work? And what exactly is in the bag that will be delivered to my house?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ryan

subject: Re: For your kind attention
body:
I have responded to all your demands. Can you proceed now to make the
payment today?

subject: Re: For your kind attention
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. I'm glad to hear that all the demands have been met. However, before we proceed with the payment, could you kindly provide more details about it? For instance, what is this payment for and how much is it? Also, could you explain the process of making the payment?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ryan

subject: Re: For your kind attention
body:
Below was my conversation with you on the 9th of February.
Within 7 working days it will be resolved and delivered. There is a process
we call the diplomatic delivery system .There is a process to obtain a
global clearance certificate. All these can be achieved within 7
working days.

There is coverage that the authorities in your country will not be able to
question the consignment at the airport due to the diplomatic bag that will
be used. That is what is referred to as DIPLOMATIC COVERAGE CERTIFICATE.

subject: Re: For your kind attention
body:
Message sent on the same 9th of Feb.
Just be assured that your information is secured with us. We have nothing
to do with your information rather that process the delivery of this
consignment.
The worth we discovered is about $5,000,000.00 usd sealed for delivery.
Proceed and forward your full details because it will be used to process
the documentation and delivery of it.
Documentation are involved in the process for the approvals.

subject: Re: For your kind attention
body:
I have sent all the previous details as discussed to you.You can see from
there that we have discussed all that needs to be done .What is left now is
to take action and let's make meaningful progress.
